issue.title: [CF 1393] How to select icons from addon settings window? (not using screen)
issue.body:
There is General Tab - from combo you can select profile.

There is Group Tab - from combo you can select group.

There is Icon Tab - no combo! there used to be (old UI) some arrows on the corners, then you could go through icons in current group, now they are removed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Tedinys | Imported from CurseForge issue #1393 | Raw

comments.body:
You can't. That's also not what those arrows did. They cycled through the icons that you were previously editing, not through all the icons in a group.

 

Currently no plans to bring them back.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
